description:
Ever wonder what Olive Town's eligible bachelors and bachelorettes would look like dolled up in luxurious yukata? Wonder no longer! This set allows you to dress up all 10 marriage candidates to make your town feel like it's a festival every day.

* To change the marriage candidates' outfits, select "Downloadable Content" from the title screen, then enable the outfits in the "Apply Downloadable Content" menu.
* Marriage candidate outfit sets are not available for marriage candidates added in the Expansion Packs.
name: Yukata Set (Marriage Candidates)
